name: Prophecy of Submersion
description: When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the Hydro-Related Reactions you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
descriptionraw: When your $[A1203], who has this card equipped, is the active character, the $[K212] you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
descriptionreplaced: When your Mona, who has this card equipped, is the active character, the <color=#80C0FFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro-Related Reactions</color> you trigger deal +2 additional DMG.
